Cart

ID
{{ cart.id }}
Date
{{ cart.date | formatMediumDatetime }}
Total Costs
{{ cart.totalCosts }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { ICart } from '../cart.model'; @Component({ selector: 'jhi-cart-detail', templateUrl: './cart-detail.component.html', }) export class CartDetailComponent implements OnInit { cart: ICart | null = null; constructor(protected activatedRoute: ActivatedRoute) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.activatedRoute.data.subscribe(({ cart }) => { this.cart = cart; }); } previousState(): void { window.history.back(); } }
